name: dfs.qjournal.http.open.timeout.ms
description:
Timeout in milliseconds when open a new HTTP connection to remote
    journals.

name: ftp.stream-buffer-size
description:
The size of buffer to stream files.
  The size of this buffer should probably be a multiple of hardware
  page size (4096 on Intel x86), and it determines how much data is
  buffered during read and write operations.

name: dfs.namenode.path.based.cache.refresh.interval.ms
description:
The amount of milliseconds between subsequent path cache rescans.  Path
    cache rescans are when we calculate which blocks should be cached, and on
    what datanodes.

    By default, this parameter is set to 30 seconds.

name: dfs.qjournal.start-segment.timeout.ms
description: Quorum timeout in milliseconds for starting a log segment.

name: dfs.namenode.accesstime.precision
description:
The access time for HDFS file is precise upto this value. 
               The default value is 1 hour. Setting a value of 0 disables
               access times for HDFS.

name: dfs.provided.aliasmap.load.retries
description:
The number of retries on the Datanode to load the provided aliasmap;
      defaults to 0.

name: dfs.namenode.blockreport.queue.size
description: The queue size of BlockReportProcessingThread in BlockManager.

name: hadoop.kerberos.min.seconds.before.relogin
description:
The minimum time between relogin attempts for Kerberos, in
    seconds.
